data.lyric:
[ti:It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Pure... Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas - Perry Como (佩里·科莫)/The Fontane Sisters
[00:13.42]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[00:16.56]
[00:17.96]Everywhere you go
[00:20.95]
[00:21.82]Take a look at the five and ten
[00:24.40]It's glistening once again
[00:26.41]With candy canes and silver lanes aglow
[00:29.18]
[00:30.55]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[00:33.52]
[00:35.17]Toys in every store
[00:38.28]
[00:39.41]But the prettiest sight to see is the holly that will be
[00:43.57]On your own front door
[00:46.53]
[00:47.51]A pair of hopalong boots and a pistol that shoots
[00:50.07]Is the wish of Barney and Ben
[00:52.29]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[00:54.89]Is the hope of Janice and Jen
[00:56.44]And Mom and Dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[01:00.07]
[01:04.86]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[01:08.16]
[01:09.52]Everywhere you go
[01:12.28]
[01:13.20]There's a tree in the Grand Hotel one in the park as well
[01:17.29]
[01:17.87]It's the sturdy kind that doesn't mind the snow
[01:20.65]
[01:22.08]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[01:25.59]
[01:26.52]Soon the bells will start
[01:29.64]
[01:30.37]And the thing that will make them ring is the carol that you sing
[01:34.72]Right within your heart
[01:38.43]
[01:55.85]A pair of hopalong boots and a pistol that shoots
[01:58.25]Is the wish of Barney and Ben
[02:00.48]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[02:03.06]Is the hope of Janice and Jen
[02:04.68]And Mom and Dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[02:07.99]
[02:08.69]Ah ahh
[02:09.49]
[02:12.82]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[02:15.82]
[02:17.22]Soon the bells will start
[02:20.32]
[02:21.24]And the thing that will make them ring is the carol that you sing
[02:25.44]Right within your heart
data.trans:
[ti:It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Pure... Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:13.42]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[00:16.56]
[00:17.96]不论你走到哪儿
[00:20.95]
[00:21.82]瞧一眼小卖部
[00:24.40]又开始闪耀夺目
[00:26.41]糖果手杖，银色小巷
[00:29.18]
[00:30.55]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[00:33.52]
[00:35.17]每个商店的玩具
[00:38.28]
[00:39.41]但那最美的风景仍是
[00:43.57]自家门前的那颗冬青树
[00:46.53]
[00:47.51]一双期待已久的靴子
[00:50.07]这是Barney 和Ben的愿望
[00:52.29]会说话和走路的布娃娃
[00:54.89]是Janice和Jen的希望
[00:56.44]爸爸和妈妈不在等待再次开学
[01:00.07]
[01:04.86]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[01:08.16]
[01:09.52]不论你走到哪儿
[01:12.28]
[01:13.20]都会有一棵树在饭店里 像在公园里的一样
[01:17.29]
[01:17.87]强健不畏风雪
[01:20.65]
[01:22.08]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[01:25.59]
[01:26.52]马上钟声就要敲响
[01:29.64]
[01:30.37]使它响起的正是那歌谣
[01:34.72]在你心中所唱
[01:38.43]
[01:55.85]一双期待已久的靴子
[01:58.25]这是Barney 和Ben的愿望
[02:00.48]会说话和走路的布娃娃
[02:03.06]是Janice和Jen的希望
[02:04.68]爸爸和妈妈不在等待再次开学
[02:07.99]
[02:08.69]//
[02:09.49]
[02:12.82]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[02:15.82]
[02:17.22]马上钟声就要敲响
[02:20.32]
[02:21.24]使它响起的正是那歌谣
[02:25.44]在你心中所唱
